content: {"name": "Beltsville Adventist Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Distribution at Parking Lot\n* Provide rental and utilities assistance on a case by case basis for PG County District 1 residents only", "email": "", "url": "https://www.beltsvillesda.org/calendar", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4220 Ammendale Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Beltsville", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20705", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.0541036, "longitude": -76.92136099999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 937-8119", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
